Package org.springdata.cassandra.cql.generator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddColumnCqlGenerator
    CQL generator for generating an ADD clause of an ALTER TABLE statement.
    AlterColumnCqlGenerator
    CQL generator for generating an ALTER column clause of an ALTER TABLE statement.
    AlterKeyspaceCqlGenerator
    CQL generator for generating a ALTER KEYSPACE statement.
    AlterTableCqlGenerator
    CQL generator for generating ALTER TABLE statements.
    ColumnChangeCqlGenerator<T extends ColumnChangeSpecification>
    Base class for column change CQL generators.
    CreateIndexCqlGenerator
    CQL generator for generating a CREATE INDEX statement.
    CreateKeyspaceCqlGenerator
    CQL generator for generating a CREATE KEYSPACE statement.
    CreateTableCqlGenerator
    CQL generator for generating a CREATE TABLE statement.
    DropColumnCqlGenerator
    CQL generator for generating a DROP column clause of an ALTER TABLE statement.
    DropIndexCqlGenerator
    CQL generator for generating a DROP INDEX statement.
    DropKeyspaceCqlGenerator
    CQL generator for generating a DROP KEYSPACE statement.
    DropTableCqlGenerator
    CQL generator for generating a DROP TABLE statement.
    TableCqlGenerator<T extends TableSpecification<T>>
    Base class that contains behavior common to CQL generation for table operations.
    UseKeyspaceCqlGenerator
    CQL generator for generating a USE KEYSPACE statement.
    WithNameCqlGenerator<T extends WithNameSpecification<T>>  
    WithOptionsCqlGenerator<O extends Option,T extends WithOptionsSpecification<O,T>>
    Abstract class for entities that have options.
